attributes.description: This vehicle is one in a million belonged to a dear friend of ours, He has been absolutely fanatical about the way he has maintained and looked after his vehicle. Always garage parked, THE CAR IS ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS, Looks, feels and drives like a brand new car Full service history, every single service completed on schedule and up to date In my opinion, this version of the TOYOTA AURIS is one of the most beautiful TOYOTAs ever made, just such stunning curves. From a time before these cars became so ugly and square. Blue Water Metallic, Black Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with Satin Silver Trim. THIS IS THE TOP OF THE RANGE 1.8 RX SPEC and comes fully loaded with every extra and luxury including. Multi Functional Sports Leather Steering, Comfort Access, Keyless go, Climate Control, Multi Media Player, Full Leather Upholstery with white stitching and seat Heating Function, Beautiful Toyota RX Light Alloy Wheels, Auto Armor Smash and Grab Safety film etc etc. 4 TYRES ARE IN EXELLENT CONDITION. This is a very rare opportunity to own the best AURIS ever made with good mileage and in special condition at a reasonable price Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security DEKRA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
attributes.title: 2009 Toyota Auris 180 RX
